title: Manuscript Object
description: A manuscript or codex, either real or a hypothetical reconstruction

type.description: A reference to a controlled term that is stored in a database table, referenced via ID but including a human-readable label

extent.description: The extent, expressed in number of folios, which comprise the manuscript object

weight.description: A string expression of the manuscript object's weight

dim.description: A string expression of an object's dimensions, whether manuscript block, folio, or writing area

state.description: The current state of the manuscript object

fol.description: A string expressing the foliation of the object in a semi-controlled format
fol.$comment: could require a pattern to capture the style of input we require. e.g. 'ff. 1-24 + flyleaves I-III'

coll.description: A string expressing the collation of the object following a semi-controlled format, such as a collational formula
coll.$comment: could require a pattern to conform these to a specific collational formula scheme

items.description: A reference to a controlled term that is stored in a database table, referenced via ID but including a human-readable label

items.title: Part
items.description: The physical portion of a manuscript object representing a distinct production unit

locus.$comment: Can use format to restrain to regex for, e.g., 'ff. x-y'

items.title: Paracontent
items.description: An item of paracontent related to a manuscript object, codicological unit, or textual artifact

items.title: Associated Name
items.description: A person, group, or organization entity connected with an object via a given role

role.description: A reference to a controlled term that is stored in a database table, referenced via ID but including a human-readable label

items.title: Associated Place
items.description: A place entity connected with an object via a given role

event.description: A reference to a controlled term that is stored in a database table, referenced via ID but including a human-readable label

items.title: Associated Date
items.description: A date associated with an object, either attested or inferred through indirect means (paleography, etc.)

type.description: A reference to a controlled term that is stored in a database table, referenced via ID but including a human-readable label

items.title: Note
items.description: A prose note of a specified type

type.description: A reference to a controlled term that is stored in a database table, referenced via ID but including a human-readable label

items.title: Related Manuscripts
items.description: A set of manuscripts that share a relation to the object context in which they are declared
